ComicInfo.Summary: Rick returns to Prison where some horrific events passed during his absence. The only good news in all the tragedy is that Tyreese managed to miraculously survive against the horde of zombies. And the murderer of the Greeene sisters is finally revealed.
ComicInfo.Title: Safety Behind Bars, Pt. 4
